page.title: 20SUMMARY
page.content: The information was gathered by 1st and 2nd year pupils of Oakmeeds School. The Land Survey and Amenities data were gathered on 2 days when separate groups surveyed 6 km squares each trekking the footpaths in the block. Most of the other information was gathered using questionnaires largely devised by the pupils themselves. The following pupils wrote the 2O pages of script and compiled the statistical counts: V.Josephs, D.Williams, A.McBryer, K.Woolford, R.Strong, S.Cooper, J.Pollard, S.Matthews, M.Challand, J.Tipler, J.Lumley, F.Miller, M.Wallace, J.Boreham, P.Goff, H.Brunsden, J.Shefford, M.Knight, K.Rowe, J.Montier, C.Miles, Justin Tipler, with the able assistance of many others.
